body: This can be a copy of a recent utility bill (dated within the last three months) or, if you were recently an employee, a copy of your wage slip (dated within the last three months). Please also provide a copy of the photograph page of your passport or driving licence.

components.label: Upload a copy of a recent utility bill or your Ministry of Justice wage slip
components.name: auto_name__43

components.label: Upload a copy of your passport or driving licence
components.name: auto_name__44

heading: Proof of identity
